revised_title: Inquiry into the Value of Ancient Greek and Roman Money
tldr: The author, Matthew Raper, investigates the value and weight of ancient Greek and Roman coins, comparing them to their modern counterparts. He examines various coins from different time periods and cities, providing a detailed analysis of their sizes and weights. Raper's research contributes to the understanding of ancient monetary systems and the history of numismatics.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Numismatics
